analyzed: mi yi mchog dang 'dir ni mtshungs pa med //
translated: The supreme among men, is unequaled here.

original: ces bya ba ni rig sngags 'di'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rig sngags 'di'o //
translated: This refers to the knowledge-mantra.

original: lam nas de bzhin gshegs ba'i ngo bo dang lha'i lhar gyur pa'i ngo bo nying dang mi'i mchog kyang yang dag par 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: lam nas de bzhin gshegs ba'i ngo bo dang lha'i lhar gyur pa'i ngo bo nying dang mi'i mchog kyang yang dag par 'gyur pa'o //
translated: And by this path, one becomes the essence of the Tathagata, the essence of the god of gods, and the best of men.

original: de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs //🔽zhes bya ba ni /🔽stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma ste yang na dkon mchog gsum mo //🔽gsung ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o //🔽bden bzhes bya ba ni /🔽stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'o //🔽de yis zhes bya ba ni gang zag go //🔽'dir ni zhes bya ba ni /🔽sems can thams cad dang rig sngags sgrub pa'o //🔽bde legs shog ces bya ba ni /🔽bkra shis par gyur cig pa'o /

original: yang na de kho na nyid kyi sgo nas ye shes bdud rtsi dang 'grogs pa'o //
analyzed: yang na de kho na nyid kyi sgo nas ye shes bdud rtsi dang 'grogs pa'o //
translated: Or else, it is the union with the nectar of intuition through reality.

original: shes pas sh'akya thub des rab tu phye //
analyzed: shes pas sh'akya thub des rab tu phye //
translated: The Sage Sakyamuni has revealed it with his knowledge.

original: zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma ste yang dag par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma ste yang dag par bstan pa'o //
translated: This is the teaching of the Queen of Spells, the Great Mound of Perfection.

original: bdud rtsi zhi ba 'dus byas ma yin pa //
analyzed: bdud rtsi zhi ba 'dus byas ma yin pa //
translated: The nectar is peace, not compounded.

original: zhes bya ba ni ye shes te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ye shes te /
translated: This is intuition.

original: de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: de kho na nyid do //
translated: This is reality.

original: yang na ni 'gag pa'o //
analyzed: yang na ni 'gag pa'o //
translated: Or else, it is cessation.

original: mtshungs pa gang yang med ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: mtshungs pa gang yang med ces bya ba ni /
translated: There is nothing at all that is equal to it.

original: de'i sgo nas gang yang med pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sgo nas gang yang med pa'o //
translated: There is nothing at all that is like it.

original: de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
analyzed: de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
translated: Therefore, it is said to be the supreme jewel.🔽By that truth, may there be well-being here.

original: bden pa de yis 'dir ni bde legs shog / ces bya ba ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bzhin du gang yang 'grub ste /
analyzed: bden pa de yis 'dir ni bde legs shog / ces bya ba ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bzhin du gang yang 'grub ste /
translated: Like a wish-fulfilling jewel, it accomplishes anything at all.

original: de yang dkon mchog gsum yin no //
analyzed: de yang dkon mchog gsum yin no //
translated: And that is the Three Jewels.

original: de'i bden pas bkra shis par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bden pas bkra shis par gyur pa'o //
translated: By their truth, may there be auspiciousness.

original: mchog tu gang 'dod tshul bzhen rab bstan pa //
analyzed: mchog tu gang 'dod tshul bzhen rab bstan pa //
translated: The teaching of the supreme truth, just as it is,

original: zhes bya ba ni khyad par @68b 'phags pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni khyad par @68b 'phags pa ste /
translated: This is the superiority.

original: dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like a wish-fulfilling gem.

original: ston pa'i rnal 'byor bla med rtag bsgrub pa //
analyzed: ston pa'i rnal 'byor bla med rtag bsgrub pa //
translated: The yoga of the teacher is always accomplished.

original: zhes bya ba ni ston pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhen /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ston pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhen /
translated: What is the characteristic of the teacher?

original: nyon mongs bdud tshogs gcod byed cing //
analyzed: nyon mongs bdud tshogs gcod byed cing //
translated: He is the one who cuts the hosts of afflictive demons

original: ngan 'gro srid las skyob byed pa //
analyzed: ngan 'gro srid las skyob byed pa //
translated: and protects from the existence of the lower realms.

original: ston pa'i ston pa rjod byed yin //
analyzed: ston pa'i ston pa rjod byed yin //
translated: He is the teacher of the teacher.

original: rnal 'byor ni thabs shes rab kyi bdag nyid /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni thabs shes rab kyi bdag nyid /
translated: Yoga is the nature of method and wisdom.

original: bla na med pa ni gong na med pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa ni gong na med pa'o //
translated: Unsurpassed is above.🔽The two eyes are like vajras.

original: rdo rje lta bu'i mig gnyis lam mthong ba //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i mig gnyis lam mthong ba //
translated: The path is seen.

original: zhes bya ba ni rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa dang 'bras bu rdo rje'i theg pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa dang 'bras bu rdo rje'i theg pa'o //
translated: This is the vehicle of characteristics and the resultant Vajrayāna.

original: rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa gang zhe na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lam du 'khyer ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa gang zhe na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lam du 'khyer ba'o //
translated: What is the vehicle of characteristics? It is the integration of the thirty-seven factors of awakening on the path.

original: 'bras bu rdo rje'i theg pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'bras bu rdo rje'i theg pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the resultant Vajrayāna?

original: sku gsung thugs ye shes lnga lam du 'khyer ba'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs ye shes lnga lam du 'khyer ba'o //
translated: It is the integration of the five pristine consciousnesses of body, speech, mind, and wisdom on the path.

original: ting 'dzin de dang mnyam pa yod ma yin //
analyzed: ting 'dzin de dang mnyam pa yod ma yin //
translated: There is no samādhi that is equal to it.

original: zhes bya ba ni de'i gong na khyad par gang yang med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de'i gong na khyad par gang yang med pa'o //
translated: This means that there is nothing superior to it.

original: de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
analyzed: de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
translated: Therefore, it is called the supreme jewel.

original: bden pa de yis 'dir ni bde legs shog /
analyzed: bden pa de yis 'dir ni bde legs shog /
translated: By this truth, may there be well-being here.

original: ces bya ba ni stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma rin chen gyi bden pa 'di 'chang ba thams cad bkra shis pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma rin chen gyi bden pa 'di 'chang ba thams cad bkra shis pa'o //
translated: This is the jewel truth of the Great Thousand Destruction, which is auspicious for all who uphold it.

original: gang zag ces bya ba ni 'khor ba nas yang nas yang du 'dzag pa'o //
analyzed: gang zag ces bya ba ni 'khor ba nas yang nas yang du 'dzag pa'o //
translated: The person is one who drips again and again from saṃsāra.

original: nyan thos 'gog pa yin te bye brag tu smra ba'i mtshan ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: nyan thos 'gog pa yin te bye brag tu smra ba'i mtshan ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is the cessation of the śrāvakas, characterized by the Vaibhāṣikas.

original: chen po brgyad po rab bsngags shing zhes bya ba ni dgra bcom pa rnams yin te /
analyzed: chen po brgyad po rab bsngags shing zhes bya ba ni dgra bcom pa rnams yin te /
translated: The eight great ones are the arhats.

original: 'od srungs dang / 'od srungs chen po dang / ga ya 'od srungs dang / chu klung 'od srungs dang / cang shes koondi n+ya dang / dga' byed dang / ka ta ya'i bu chen po dang / ba ku la dang brgyad do //
analyzed: 'od srungs dang / 'od srungs chen po dang / ga ya 'od srungs dang / chu klung 'od srungs dang / cang shes koondi n+ya dang / dga' byed dang / ka ta ya'i bu chen po dang / ba ku la dang brgyad do //
translated: They are Kāśyapa, Mahākāśyapa, Gayākāśyapa, Nadīkāśyapa, Ajnata Kauṇḍinya, Nanda, Mahākappina, and Bakkula.

original: gang zag zung bzhir brjod pa de dang ni phal chen ba dang thams cad sma ba dang gnas brtan pa dang / thams cad bkur ba dang bzhi yin no //
analyzed: gang zag zung bzhir brjod pa de dang ni phal chen ba dang thams cad sma ba dang gnas brtan pa dang / thams cad bkur ba dang bzhi yin no //
translated: The four pairs of persons are the same as the four groups of the Mahāsāṃghika, the Ekavyāvahārika, the Gokulika, and the Bahuśrutīya.

original: 'dul ba'i sgo nas gang zag mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: 'dul ba'i sgo nas gang zag mdzad pa'o //
translated: The persons are distinguished according to the Vinaya.

original: drang srong chen po gang zag mtshungs pa med //
analyzed: drang srong chen po gang zag mtshungs pa med //
translated: The great ṛṣi is the peerless person.

original: ces bya ba ni nga yin te 'khyil ba dang / 'khyil ba chen po dang / 'od srungs 'khyil ba dang / 'od srungs chen po 'khyil ba dang / chu klung 'od srungs 'khyil ba dang / de dag ni drang srong gang zag go //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni nga yin te 'khyil ba dang / 'khyil ba chen po dang / 'od srungs 'khyil ba dang / 'od srungs chen po 'khyil ba dang / chu klung 'od srungs 'khyil ba dang / de dag ni drang srong gang zag go //
translated: The great ṛṣi is me. The ṛṣi is the person.

original: da dag ni 'gog pa chen po ste /
analyzed: da dag ni 'gog pa chen po ste /
translated: They are the great cessation.

original: bcom ldan 'das yin pas so so'i skye bo mchod ba'i yul ma yin te 'khor ba la zhugs pa'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas ni 'khor ba las ldog ba'i phyir ro ;

original: / bde bar gshegs pa'i sras ni mdzes par gshegs pa la sogs gsum la 'jug ste mdzes par gshegs pa ni ji ltar dbu ma'i theg pa mkhyen pas nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pas spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan /

translated: The heirs of the sugatas are engaged in the three: beautiful conduct and so on. Beautiful conduct refers to the perfection of elimination, since they know the middle way and have eliminated the obscurations of affliction and so on.

original: yang na mdzes pa ni chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa'i de kho na nyid rtogs shing khong du chud pa ste /
analyzed: yang na mdzes pa ni chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa'i de kho na nyid rtogs shing khong du chud pa ste /

analyzed: 'dis ni mu stegs can gyi mkhyen pa rnams las khyad par bstan te /

analyzed: de dag ni mdzes par gyur pa'i rgyu thams cad spangs pa'i phyir dang phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir ro //

original: ji srid du rtogs pa'i dbye ba khong du chud pas lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes pa bag chags skyon gyi mtshan nyid thams cad rang gis mkhyen cing /

analyzed: lam ston pa la rnam pa thams cad du mi gas lag spangs pa'i phyir bde bar gshegs pa'o //

original: yid ni shes rab bo //
analyzed: yid ni shes rab bo //
translated: The mind is wisdom.

original: thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel pa'o //
translated: The union of method and wisdom.

original: thabs med pas zin pa'i shes rab bcing ba gang zhe na 'di ltar stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang ; smon pa med pa la des par rtogs shing mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la nges par mi rtog pa 'di ni thabs med pas zin pa'i shes rab ste /
analyzed: thabs med pas zin pa'i shes rab bcing ba gang zhe na 'di ltar stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang ; smon pa med pa la des par rtogs shing mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la nges par mi rtog pa 'di ni thabs med pas zin pa'i shes rab ste /
translated: What is wisdom not embraced by method? It is the realization of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, but the non-realization of the major and minor marks, the adornment of the buddha-fields, and the ripening of sentient beings. This is wisdom not embraced by method, and it is bondage.

original: bcings pa'o // thabs kyis zin pa'i shes rab grol ba gang zhe na ;
analyzed: bcings pa'o // thabs kyis zin pa'i shes rab grol ba gang zhe na ;
translated: What is wisdom embraced by method, which is liberation?

original: 'di lta ste mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la sems des par rtogs shing /
analyzed: 'di lta ste mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la sems des par rtogs shing /
translated: It is the realization of the major and minor marks, the adornment of the buddha-fields, and the ripening of sentient beings,

original: stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang 'dris par byed la //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang 'dris par byed la //
translated: and the cultivation of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: yongs su mi skyo ba de ni thabs kyis zin pa'i shes rab ste grol ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su mi skyo ba de ni thabs kyis zin pa'i shes rab ste grol ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is the wisdom that is embraced by means, and it is called “liberation.”

original: de dag ni stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'o //
analyzed: de dag ni stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'o //
translated: These are the powers of the Great Thousandfold World-destroying Queen.

original: 'jigs pa brgyad dang phrad mi 'gyur //
analyzed: 'jigs pa brgyad dang phrad mi 'gyur //
translated: One will not encounter the eight fears.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa ni seng ge dang glang po che dang / me dang / sbrul dang / btson du bzung ba dang / chu dang / rkun po dang / yi dags dang ni brgyad do //🔽phrad mi @71a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa ni seng ge dang glang po che dang / me dang / sbrul dang / btson du bzung ba dang / chu dang / rkun po dang / yi dags dang ni brgyad do // phrad mi @71a * //
translated: The eight fears are those of lions, elephants, fire, snakes, imprisonment, water, thieves, and pretas.

original: 'gyur ni rig sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: 'gyur ni rig sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: “Will not encounter” means that one will be protected by the vidya-mantra.

original: des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
analyzed: des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
translated: Therefore, the Sangha is said to be the supreme jewel.🔽By the truth of that, may there be well-being here.

original: bden pa de yis 'dir ni bde legs shog / ces bya ba ni rig sngags 'dis kyang dkon mchog gsum 'grub cing /
analyzed: bden pa de yis 'dir ni bde legs shog / ces bya ba ni rig sngags 'dis kyang dkon mchog gsum 'grub cing /
translated: By this vidya-mantra, the Three Jewels are accomplished,

original: stong pa nyid du snang ba ste rin chen de'i bden pas bde legs su gyur ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid du snang ba ste rin chen de'i bden pas bde legs su gyur ba'o //
translated: and emptiness appears. By the truth of that jewel, may there be well-being.

original: ji ltar me ni rlung gis rab gtor bas //
analyzed: ji ltar me ni rlung gis rab gtor bas //
translated: Just as fire, when fanned by the wind,

original: zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is non-apprehension.

original: lag tu blangs te bgrang du med pa nyid //
analyzed: lag tu blangs te bgrang du med pa nyid //
translated: and are not to be counted by taking them in the hand.

original: ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid ni mtshan nyid ci zhe na /
analyzed: stong pa nyid ni mtshan nyid ci zhe na /
translated: What is the characteristic of emptiness?

original: brjod du yod de dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: brjod du yod de dngos po med pa'o //
translated: It is the non-existence of entities.

original: yang na stong pa nyid la rdzu 'phrul byung ngo //
analyzed: yang na stong pa nyid la rdzu 'phrul byung ngo //
translated: Or else, the miracle occurs in emptiness.

original: gang zhe na nam mkha' la rlung la sogs pa 'byung ba bzhin du'o //
analyzed: gang zhe na nam mkha' la rlung la sogs pa 'byung ba bzhin du'o //
translated: What is it? It is like the occurrence of wind in space.

original: de ltar kun tu sbyor ba rab btang ba zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar kun tu sbyor ba rab btang ba zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'o //
translated: Thus, “having completely given up the fetters” is conventional and ultimate.

original: kun rdzob ni thabs kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob ni thabs kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: The conventional is the essence of method.

original: don dam pa ni shes rab kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: don dam pa ni shes rab kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: The ultimate is the essence of wisdom.

original: de bzhin du thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba'o //
translated: Thus, the union of method and wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas sras rnams bstan du med par 'gro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sras rnams bstan du med par 'gro //
translated: The Buddha’s heirs go to the invisible.

original: zhes bya ba ni dper na yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal po ni ji ltar /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dper na yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal po ni ji ltar /
translated: This is like the wish-fulfilling king.

original: yid la bsam pa rdzogs byed pa //
analyzed: yid la bsam pa rdzogs byed pa //
translated: Fulfilling the wishes of beings,

original: de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang //
translated: so too is the nature of the Buddha,

original: rtag tu smon lam rdzogs par grub //
analyzed: rtag tu smon lam rdzogs par grub //
translated: always fulfilling the aspirations.

original: mtha' dang dbus med 'jig rten 'dir //
analyzed: mtha' dang dbus med 'jig rten 'dir //
translated: In this world without center or edge,

original: 'jig rten pa ni 'dres par 'gyur//
analyzed: 'jig rten pa ni 'dres par 'gyur//
translated: the worldly are mixed up.

original: de yi smon lam de dag gis //
analyzed: de yi smon lam de dag gis //
translated: By those aspirations of theirs,

original: phyogs bcu'i de dag rgyal ba gang //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i de dag rgyal ba gang //
translated: the Victors in the ten directions

original: yang na / ji ltar zla ba shar 'gyur ba //
analyzed: yang na / ji ltar zla ba shar 'gyur ba //
translated: are like the moon rising,

original: tshad med pa yi gzugs brnyan rnams //
analyzed: tshad med pa yi gzugs brnyan rnams //
translated: its immeasurable reflections

original: chu yi snod du snang 'gyur kyang //
analyzed: chu yi snod du snang 'gyur kyang //
translated: appear in vessels of water,

original: zla ba gnyis su 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: zla ba gnyis su 'gyur ba med //
translated: but the moon does not become two.

original: de bzhin chags med mkhyen ldan rnams //
analyzed: de bzhin chags med mkhyen ldan rnams //
translated: Likewise, the knowers who are free from attachment,

original: chags med rnam par sangs rgyas pa //
analyzed: chags med rnam par sangs rgyas pa //
translated: enlightened without attachment,

original: zhing rnams kun nas rab tu snang //
analyzed: zhing rnams kun nas rab tu snang //
translated: appear in all the fields.

original: sangs rgyas la ni gnyis kyang med //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la ni gnyis kyang med //
translated: The Buddha is not dual.

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs //🔽bden pa de yis 'dir ni bde legs shog / ces bya ba ni 'phags pa dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin yang rig sngags 'di yis grub ste /
analyzed: des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs // bden pa de yis 'dir ni bde legs shog / ces bya ba ni 'phags pa dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin yang rig sngags 'di yis grub ste /
translated: Therefore the Saṅgha is said to be the supreme jewel.🔽By that truth here may there be well-being.🔽This is the accomplishment of the knowledge-mantra of the noble arhats.

original: dkon mchog de'i bden pas bkra shis par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: dkon mchog de'i bden pas bkra shis par gyur pa'o //
translated: By the truth of that jewel, may there be auspiciousness.

original: sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba //
analyzed: sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba //
translated: Whatever beings, moving or unmoving,

original: zhes bya ba ni sems can ni 'gro ba rigs drug tsam mo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sems can ni 'gro ba rigs drug tsam mo //
translated: Sentient beings are the six kinds of living beings.

original: bems po la sogs pa 'gyur ba rnams so //
analyzed: bems po la sogs pa 'gyur ba rnams so //
translated: They are the transformations of the inanimate and so on.

original: de dag thams cad 'dir ni bde gyur cig / ces bya ba @71b ni de dag ni sems can no //
analyzed: de dag thams cad 'dir ni bde gyur cig / ces bya ba @71b ni de dag ni sems can no //
translated: May all of them here be happy.

original: 'dir ni stong chen mo'i byin rlabs so //
analyzed: 'dir ni stong chen mo'i byin rlabs so //
translated: Here, it is the blessing of the Great Thousand.

original: bde gyur cig ni sems can thams cad do //
analyzed: bde gyur cig ni sems can thams cad do //
translated: May they be happy.

original: ston mchog lha dang mis ni mchod 'os pa //
analyzed: ston mchog lha dang mis ni mchod 'os pa //
translated: The supreme teacher, worthy of worship by gods and men,🔽Having bowed to the Buddha, may there be well-being here today.

original: sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal deng 'dir bde legs shog / ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhal nas byung ba stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i ngo bo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal deng 'dir bde legs shog / ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhal nas byung ba stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i ngo bo //
translated: The nature of emptiness, arisen from the mouths of the Buddhas, is the essence of the Great Thousand Destroyer.

original: sems can rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa'o //
translated: It is worthy of worship by sentient beings.

original: sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba //
analyzed: sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba //
translated: Those sentient beings, moving and unmoving,🔽May all of them here be happy.

original: de dag thams cad 'dir ni bde gyur cig / ces bya ba ni 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can rnams rin chen chos kyi bden pas bde legs su gyur pa'o ;
analyzed: de dag thams cad 'dir ni bde gyur cig / ces bya ba ni 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can rnams rin chen chos kyi bden pas bde legs su gyur pa'o ;
translated: The sentient beings of the six kinds of living beings, by the truth of the precious Dharma, become well-being.

original: ; zhi ba chags bral lha mis mchod 'os pa //🔽chos la phyag 'tshal deng 'dir bde legs shog / ces bya ba ni 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can rnams sdug bsngal dang bral bar byed pa 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spangs pa /
analyzed: ; zhi ba chags bral lha mis mchod 'os pa // chos la phyag 'tshal deng 'dir bde legs shog / ces bya ba ni 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can rnams sdug bsngal dang bral bar byed pa 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spangs pa /
translated: The peaceful, free from attachment, worthy of worship by gods and men,🔽Homage to the Dharma! May there be well-being here today!

original: dmigs pa med pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal ba'o//
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal ba'o//
translated: This is the homage to the Dharma without reference point, which frees the sentient beings of the six kinds of beings from suffering and abandons the five sense objects.

original: sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba //🔽de dag thams cad 'dir ni bde gyur cig / ces bya ba ni 'phags pa'i bden ba bzhis sems can gyi don byed pa rnams de'i bden pas 'gro ba rigs drug zhi bar 'gyur ba /
analyzed: sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba // de dag thams cad 'dir ni bde gyur cig / ces bya ba ni 'phags pa'i bden ba bzhis sems can gyi don byed pa rnams de'i bden pas 'gro ba rigs drug zhi bar 'gyur ba /
translated: May all sentient beings, moving and unmoving,🔽Here be happy!

original: dkon mchog bden pa de'i bkra shis pa'o //
analyzed: dkon mchog bden pa de'i bkra shis pa'o //
translated: This is the auspiciousness of the truth of the Three Jewels, which acts for the welfare of sentient beings through the four noble truths, and through their truth, the six kinds of beings will be pacified.

original: tshogs kyi dam pa zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu dang rgyu'o //
analyzed: tshogs kyi dam pa zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu dang rgyu'o //
translated: The supreme assembly is the result and the cause.

original: lha mis mchod 'os pa /
analyzed: lha mis mchod 'os pa /
translated: Worthy of worship by gods and men

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa thams cad kyis mchod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa thams cad kyis mchod pa'o //
translated: is worshipped by all worldly beings.

original: dge 'dun phyag 'tshal deng 'dir bde legs shog / ces bya ba ni mi dge ba spangs pas dge ba dang du blangs pa bden pa bzhi'i sgo nas spyod pa rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun phyag 'tshal deng 'dir bde legs shog / ces bya ba ni mi dge ba spangs pas dge ba dang du blangs pa bden pa bzhi'i sgo nas spyod pa rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'o //
translated: This is homage to the practice of virtue through the abandonment of non-virtue by means of the four noble truths.

original: 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te //🔽sa 'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag / ces bya ba ni glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa lnga'i ngo bo las gyur pa /
analyzed: 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te // sa 'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag / ces bya ba ni glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa lnga'i ngo bo las gyur pa /
translated: Whatever spirits have come here,🔽whether on the earth or in the atmosphere,

original: de dag 'byung bo'i tshogs rnams so //
analyzed: de dag 'byung bo'i tshogs rnams so //
translated: These are the hosts of spirits that have arisen from the essence of the five adventitious afflictions.🔽May they always be loving toward all beings,🔽and may they practice the Dharma day and night.

original: skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog / nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig / ces bya ba ni rig sngags 'di'i bden pas byams pas khyab nas chos kyi dam pa dar ba smon lam btab pa'o //
analyzed: skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog / nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig / ces bya ba ni rig sngags 'di'i bden pas byams pas khyab nas chos kyi dam pa dar ba smon lam btab pa'o //
translated: This is the aspiration to spread the supreme Dharma through the pervasion of love by the truth of this knowledge mantra.

original: 'di na rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden gang gis //
analyzed: 'di na rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden gang gis //
translated: Here, the Victorious One, the Conqueror of the Enemy, by whatever truth

original: shin tu bden pa gsungs shing brdzun med pa //
analyzed: shin tu bden pa gsungs shing brdzun med pa //
translated: speaks the utmost truth and is without falsehood,

original: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' dang @72a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' dang @72a * //
translated: This is the speech of the Buddhas,

original: rig sngags kyi bden pas the tshom med pa'o //
analyzed: rig sngags kyi bden pas the tshom med pa'o //
translated: By the truth of the vidyā-mantras, there is no doubt.🔽By that truth, here may there be well-being.

original: bden ba de yis 'dir ni bde legs shog / ces bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pas /
analyzed: bden ba de yis 'dir ni bde legs shog / ces bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pas /
translated: This means that by the truth of the Three Jewels,

original: 'jigs pa dang nang rnams dang bral zhing /
analyzed: 'jigs pa dang nang rnams dang bral zhing /
translated: one is free from all fears and dangers,

original: bkra shis dang bde legs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bkra shis dang bde legs su gyur pa'o //
translated: and becomes auspicious and well.🔽May all of them be liberated from great fear.

original: de kun 'jigs pa che las thar gyur cig / ces bya ba ni stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma ste rang bzhin ni smig rgyu dang 'dra ste ngo bo nyid ni rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: de kun 'jigs pa che las thar gyur cig / ces bya ba ni stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma ste rang bzhin ni smig rgyu dang 'dra ste ngo bo nyid ni rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas so //
translated: This is the Great Mound of the Destroyer, whose nature is like a mirage, whose essence is the buddhas of the five families,

original: mtshon bya ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: mtshon bya ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: whose object of expression is the gnosis of equality,

original: mtshon pa ni stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: mtshon pa ni stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa'o //
translated: whose expression is the Great Mound of the Destroyer,

original: rigs ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rin po che'i rigs so //
analyzed: rigs ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rin po che'i rigs so //
translated: whose family is the vajra family and the jewel family,

original: de'i phyag mtshan dang sku mdog ni ser mo zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa /
analyzed: de'i phyag mtshan dang sku mdog ni ser mo zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa /
translated: whose hand implements and color are yellow, with three faces and six arms,

original: g-yas mthing ga g-yon dmar ba spyan gsum pa dbu la rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can g-yas pa gsum na rin po che dang ral gri dang mnga'o //
analyzed: g-yas mthing ga g-yon dmar ba spyan gsum pa dbu la rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can g-yas pa gsum na rin po che dang ral gri dang mnga'o //
translated: Her right face is blue, her left face is red, and she has three eyes. She has the crown of the heads of the five families. In her three right hands she holds a jewel, a sword, and a banner.

original: g-yon pa gsum na rdo rje dang zhags pa dang gzhu'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa gsum na rdo rje dang zhags pa dang gzhu'o //
translated: In her three left hands she holds a vajra, a lasso, and a bow.

original: zhabs rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa /
analyzed: zhabs rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa /
translated: She sits in vajra posture.

original: padma'i steng du nyi ma'i gdan dang bcas pa bzhugs pa nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa tshor ba'i phung po stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'o //
analyzed: padma'i steng du nyi ma'i gdan dang bcas pa bzhugs pa nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa tshor ba'i phung po stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'o //
translated: She sits on a lotus and sun seat, with the light of the sun, and is the aggregate of feeling, the Great Mound of the Subjugation of the Great Thousand.

original: rig sngags ni /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gi dri mas te de dag ni rig sngags kyi sgo nas mya ngan las 'das pa'o // rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ni thabs dang shes rab bo //
translated: That is the stain of meditative concentration, and they attain nirvana by means of the knowledge-mantra approach.🔽The yogis' abode.🔽Yoga is means and wisdom.

original: spyod pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi sgo nas spyod pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi sgo nas spyod pa'o //
translated: Conduct is the practice by means of means and wisdom.

original: de dag kyang rig sngags kyi sgo nas spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang rig sngags kyi sgo nas spyod pa'o //
translated: And they are practiced through the door of knowledge-mantras.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi 'byung gnas so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi 'byung gnas so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is the source of the factors of awakening.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs ni sum cu rtsa bdun no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs ni sum cu rtsa bdun no //
translated: The factors of awakening are thirty-seven.

original: de lam du 'khyer ba ste /
analyzed: de lam du 'khyer ba ste /
translated: They are taken as the path.

original: de dag kyang rig sngags kyi sgo nas 'byung gnas so //
analyzed: de dag kyang rig sngags kyi sgo nas 'byung gnas so //
translated: And they are a source through the door of knowledge-mantras.

original: nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It conquers the afflictions.

original: nyon mongs pa rnams ni bzhi'i sgo @74a * //🔽nas gnas so //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rnams ni bzhi'i sgo @74a * // nas gnas so //
translated: The afflictions abide through four doors.

original: de dag kyang rig sngags kyi sgo nas 'joms pa'o //🔽bag la nyal gyi zug rdu rnams 'byin pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de dag kyang rig sngags kyi sgo nas 'joms pa'o // bag la nyal gyi zug rdu rnams 'byin pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: And they are conquered through the door of knowledge-mantras.🔽It extracts the darts of latent tendencies.

original: bag la nyal ba ni gcer bu ba ste /
analyzed: bag la nyal ba ni gcer bu ba ste /
translated: The latent tendencies are the naked ones.

original: de dag kyang rig sngags kyi sgo nas sun 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang rig sngags kyi sgo nas sun 'byin pa'o //
translated: And they are extracted through the door of knowledge-mantras.

original: 'phags pa'i lam kun du ston pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i kun du ni lam bzhi ste de dag kyang rig sngags kyi sgo ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam kun du ston pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i kun du ni lam bzhi ste de dag kyang rig sngags kyi sgo ston pa'o //
translated: It reveals the noble path. The noble path is the four paths. And they are revealed through the door of knowledge-mantras.

original: thar pa'i sgo rnams 'byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: thar pa'i sgo rnams 'byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It opens the doors to liberation.

original: thar pa ni 'khor ba nas thar bas te /
analyzed: thar pa ni 'khor ba nas thar bas te /
translated: Liberation is from cyclic existence.

original: de dag ni rig sngags kyi sgo nas so //
analyzed: de dag ni rig sngags kyi sgo nas so //
translated: Those are by way of the door of knowledge-mantras.

original: 'jig tshogs la lta ba rnams 'jig bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'jig tshogs ni phrag dog ste /
analyzed: 'jig tshogs la lta ba rnams 'jig bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'jig tshogs ni phrag dog ste /
translated: It destroys the views of the transitory collection. The transitory collection is envy.

original: phrag dog 'joms ma ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o //
analyzed: phrag dog 'joms ma ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o //
translated: The destroyer of envy is the queen of knowledge-mantras.

original: nga rgyal gyi ri rab tu bsnyil bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nga rgyal gyi ri rab tu bsnyil bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It topples the mountain of pride.

original: nga rgyal ni ma rig pa ste ri ni rab tu chen po ste /
analyzed: nga rgyal ni ma rig pa ste ri ni rab tu chen po ste /
translated: Pride is ignorance, and the mountain is very great.

original: de dag kyang rig sngags kyi sgo nas bsnyil bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang rig sngags kyi sgo nas bsnyil bar byed pa'o //
translated: Those are toppled by way of the door of knowledge-mantras.

original: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skems par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni rgya mtsho ni rgya che ba gting ring ba ste /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skems par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni rgya mtsho ni rgya che ba gting ring ba ste /
translated: It dries up the ocean of cyclic existence. The ocean is vast and deep.

original: de dag kyang rig sngags kyi sgo nas skems pa'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang rig sngags kyi sgo nas skems pa'o //
translated: Those are dried up by way of the door of knowledge-mantras.

original: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung ba'i sems can rnams sgrol ba'o zhes bya ba ni rgya mtsho ni gting ring grangs mi chod pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung ba'i sems can rnams sgrol ba'o zhes bya ba ni rgya mtsho ni gting ring grangs mi chod pa'o //
translated: The ocean is the deep, unfathomable abyss of cyclic existence.🔽 The beings are those who have fallen into it.

original: de dag kyang rig sngags kyi sgo nas sems can sgrol ba'o //🔽bdud kyi zhags pa gcod pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de dag kyang rig sngags kyi sgo nas sems can sgrol ba'o // bdud kyi zhags pa gcod pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The liberation is by means of the mantra.

original: bdud bzhi'i zhags pa ni phyin ci log pa'o //
analyzed: bdud bzhi'i zhags pa ni phyin ci log pa'o //
translated: The bonds of Mara are the four bonds of Mara, which are the four errors.

original: de dag kyang rig sngags kyis gcod pa'o //🔽bdud kyi 'khor skrag par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de dag kyang rig sngags kyis gcod pa'o // bdud kyi 'khor skrag par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The cutting is by means of the mantra.

original: bdud ni lha'i bdud la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bdud ni lha'i bdud la sogs pa'o //
translated: The frightening of Mara's retinue is the frightening of the Maras, such as the Mara of the gods.

original: de dag kyang rig sngags kyi sgo nas skrag pa'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang rig sngags kyi sgo nas skrag pa'o //
translated: The mantra is the mantra of the knowledge of emptiness.🔽 The casting off of Mara's saliva is the casting off of the saliva of Mara, such as the saliva of Sambara.

original: bdud kyi mchil ma 'dor ba'o zhes bya ba ni bdud ni dga' rab dbang phyug la sogs pa ste de dag kyang rig sngags kyis bcom mo //
analyzed: bdud kyi mchil ma 'dor ba'o zhes bya ba ni bdud ni dga' rab dbang phyug la sogs pa ste de dag kyang rig sngags kyis bcom mo //
translated: The mantra is the mantra of the knowledge of emptiness.

original: nyon mongs pa'i g-yul 'das sgrol ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i g-yul 'das sgrol ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The crossing over of the battle of the afflictions is the crossing over of the battle of the afflictions, such as desire.🔽 The mantra is the mantra of the knowledge of emptiness.

original: nyon mongs pa ni ma rig pa la sogs pa ste de dag kyang rig sngags kyi sgo nas sgrol ba'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ni ma rig pa la sogs pa ste de dag kyang rig sngags kyi sgo nas sgrol ba'o //
translated: The afflictions are ignorance and so on, and they are liberated through the door of the knowledge mantra.🔽It causes one to enter the city of nirvāṇa.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lo //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lo //
translated: The city of nirvāṇa is the domain of the Buddha.

original: rig sngags kyi sgo nas 'khrid pa'o //
analyzed: rig sngags kyi sgo nas 'khrid pa'o //
translated: It leads through the door of the knowledge mantra.🔽It causes one to emerge from the house of saṃsāra.

original: 'khor ba'i khyim nas 'byung bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba'i khyi ma ni ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i khyim nas 'byung bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba'i khyi ma ni ma rig pa'o //
translated: The house of saṃsāra is ignorance.

original: 'byung ba ni rig pa'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba ni rig pa'o //
translated: To emerge is to have knowledge.

original: rig pa ni dge ba'o //
analyzed: rig pa ni dge ba'o //
translated: Knowledge is virtue.

original: dge ba ni grol ba'o //
analyzed: dge ba ni grol ba'o //
translated: Virtue is liberation.

original: grol @74b bar byed pa ni stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'o //
analyzed: grol @74b bar byed pa ni stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'o //
translated: The one who causes liberation is the Great Mound of Victory.

original: stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma 'di gang zhe na /
analyzed: stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma 'di gang zhe na /
translated: What is this Great Mound of Victory?

original: rang bzhin ni chu'i chu bur lta bu'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin ni chu'i chu bur lta bu'o //
translated: Its nature is like a water bubble.

original: mtshon bya ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: mtshon bya ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The object of designation is discerning wisdom.

original: rigs ni rdo rje dang padma'i rigs so //
analyzed: rigs ni rdo rje dang padma'i rigs so //
translated: Its family is the vajra and lotus families.

original: mtshon pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'o //
analyzed: mtshon pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'o //
translated: The representation is the queen of spells, the great destroyer of the thousand worlds.

original: ngo bo nyid ni rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid ni rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: The essence is the essence of the buddhas of the five families.

original: de'i phyag mtshan dang sku mdog ni gang zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyag mtshan dang sku mdog ni gang zhe na /
translated: What are her hand implements and body color?

original: zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog dmar mo //
analyzed: zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog dmar mo //
translated: She has three faces, six arms, and a red body.

original: g-yas dkar g-yon mthing ga / rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can /
analyzed: g-yas dkar g-yon mthing ga / rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can /
translated: Her right face is white, her left face is blue, and she has the crown of the five families.

original: spyan gsum pa /
analyzed: spyan gsum pa /
translated: She has three eyes.

original: phyag g-yas na padma dang ral gri g-yon na rin po che'i steng na rdo rje dang rtse gsum mo //
analyzed: phyag g-yas na padma dang ral gri g-yon na rin po che'i steng na rdo rje dang rtse gsum mo //
translated: In her right hands she holds a lotus and a sword, and in her left hands she holds a jewel and a vajra and a trident.

original: 'og ma gnyis mnyam gzhag mdzad de /
analyzed: 'og ma gnyis mnyam gzhag mdzad de /
translated: The two lower hands are in the gesture of meditation.

original: phyag gi steng na bum pa'o //
analyzed: phyag gi steng na bum pa'o //
translated: Above the hands is a vase.

original: rgyan thams cad rin po ches brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: rgyan thams cad rin po ches brgyan pa'o //
translated: She is adorned with all the ornaments of jewels.

original: zhabs rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa /
analyzed: zhabs rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa /
translated: She sits in the vajra posture.

original: padma'i steng na zla ba'i gdan dang bcas pa /
analyzed: padma'i steng na zla ba'i gdan dang bcas pa /
translated: She is on a lotus with a moon seat.

original: nyi ma'i 'ong la 'du shes kyi phung po ste /
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'ong la 'du shes kyi phung po ste /
translated: On the sun seat is the aggregate of perception.

original: rig sngags gang zhe na /🔽sy'ad ya the ngan /
analyzed: rig sngags gang zhe na / sy'ad ya the ngan /
translated: What is the spell?🔽Syād yathedam.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: sngags ni kha ngga nir gho she zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sngags ni kha ngga nir gho she zhes bya'o //
translated: The mantra is called Khamukha Nirmāśini.

original: rig sngags zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rig sngags zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid do //
translated: The vidyā is called śūnyatā.

original: stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi rgyal me gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa ni zhes bya ba ni thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i don grub pa /
analyzed: stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi rgyal me gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa ni zhes bya ba ni thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i don grub pa /
translated: The Mahāśūnyatāprajñāpāramitā is the vidyā-rāja that liberates from all grahas.

original: chos kyi bdud rtsi nyams myong dran pa med pa /
analyzed: chos kyi bdud rtsi nyams myong dran pa med pa /
translated: It is the experience of the nectar of the Dharma, without mindfulness.

original: bdud bzhi 'joms pa /
analyzed: bdud bzhi 'joms pa /
translated: It conquers the four māras.

original: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin srung ba dang skyob bar byed pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin srung ba dang skyob bar byed pa /
translated: It protects and guards the nature of emptiness.

original: 'jig rten khams la dbang byed pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten khams la dbang byed pa /
translated: It has dominion over the world systems.

original: glo bur gyi 'byung po rnams 'joms pa'o //🔽mdo sde 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: glo bur gyi 'byung po rnams 'joms pa'o // mdo sde 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It conquers the sudden bhūtas.🔽This sūtra is the oral transmission of the tathāgata arhat completely perfect buddhas as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas zhal du gsungs par sangs rgyas kyi rgyud rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas zhal du gsungs par sangs rgyas kyi rgyud rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
translated: It is the unbroken lineage of the buddhas' oral transmission.

original: bka' yang dag par snang ba phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyan phyin ci ma log pa'o //
analyzed: bka' yang dag par snang ba phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyan phyin ci ma log pa'o //
translated: The command is the unerring ornament of the four seals of the perfect appearance.

original: 'dis ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten phyag rgyas btab ste zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dis ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten phyag rgyas btab ste zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Here, the world with its gods, humans, and asuras is sealed

original: nam mkha' bzhin du khyab nas /
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin du khyab nas /
translated: means that, pervading like space,

original: 'jig rten khams la rig sngags kyi phyag rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten khams la rig sngags kyi phyag rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: the world realm is sealed with the seal of the knowledge mantra.

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med do //
translated: The buddha is nondual.🔽 The seal is the seal of that.

original: phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi phyag rgya'o //🔽phyag @75a * //🔽rgyas btab ste zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi phyag rgya'o // phyag @75a * // rgyas btab ste zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The sealing

original: rig sngags kyis btab pa'o //
analyzed: rig sngags kyis btab pa'o //
translated: means being sealed with the knowledge mantra.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer bla na med par zhugs so zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer bla na med par zhugs so zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas so //
translated: The unprecedented city of nirvāṇa means that nirvāṇa is the buddha.

original: grong ni zhing khams so //
analyzed: grong ni zhing khams so //
translated: The city is the buddha realm.

original: bla na med pa ni gong na med pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa ni gong na med pa'o //
translated: The unprecedented is the unsurpassed.

original: de'i don gyi phyir mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang zhes bya ba ni stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i lam nas sa bcu rab tu thob ste de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa bcu thob nas /
analyzed: de'i don gyi phyir mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang zhes bya ba ni stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i lam nas sa bcu rab tu thob ste de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa bcu thob nas /
translated: For that purpose, the perfect Buddhas who have fully awakened, who have attained the ten grounds on the path of Subjugating the Great Trichiliocosm, and likewise have attained the ten perfections,

original: sa bcu gcig pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis thong pa'o //
analyzed: sa bcu gcig pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis thong pa'o //
translated: attain the eleventh ground, perfect buddhahood.

original: rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos thams cad kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gnas pa rnams dang / bdag mi rtag ba'i rang bzhin bye brag pa rnams dang / dmigs pa med pas 'jig rten gyi khams lta ba rnams la lta ba rnams so//
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos thams cad kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gnas pa rnams dang / bdag mi rtag ba'i rang bzhin bye brag pa rnams dang / dmigs pa med pas 'jig rten gyi khams lta ba rnams la lta ba rnams so//
translated: All the pratyekabuddhas and śrāvakas, the perfect buddhas, who abide in śamatha and vipaśyanā, who have the nature of impermanence, and who view the world without reference points,

original: rang sangs rgyas rnams dang nyan thos rnams dang / pha ma rnams dang / sbyin gnas dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas rnams dang nyan thos rnams dang / pha ma rnams dang / sbyin gnas dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: the pratyekabuddhas, the śrāvakas, the parents, and the worthy recipients of offerings,

original: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di la de rnams kyis kyang mchod par 'os ba gzhi nas gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di la de rnams kyis kyang mchod par 'os ba gzhi nas gnas pa'o //
translated: They are worthy of worship by those who have been established in this Queen of Spells.

original: bla ma lta bu rnams la bsnyen pa kur to zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bla ma lta bu rnams la bsnyen pa kur to zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase “those who are like gurus” refers to

original: gong nas gong ngo //
analyzed: gong nas gong ngo //
translated: those who are higher.

original: tshangs par spyod pa spyad ces bya ba ni stong chen mo'i sgo nas sbyong ba'o //
analyzed: tshangs par spyod pa spyad ces bya ba ni stong chen mo'i sgo nas sbyong ba'o //
translated: The phrase “who have practiced pure conduct” refers to the practice of the purification of the great trichiliocosm.

original: tshul khrims bsrungs so //🔽sbyin pa sbyin no zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: tshul khrims bsrungs so // sbyin pa sbyin no zhes bya ba ni //
translated: The phrase “who have guarded morality” refers to🔽the practice of generosity.🔽The phrase “who have given gifts” refers to

original: 'dzem pa med par sbyin pa byin //
analyzed: 'dzem pa med par sbyin pa byin //
translated: the practice of generosity without hesitation.🔽The phrase “who have guarded supreme morality” refers to

original: tshul khrims mchog kyang shin tu bsrungs //
analyzed: tshul khrims mchog kyang shin tu bsrungs //
translated: the practice of morality.

original: bdag lung mgon gyis ma bstan te //
analyzed: bdag lung mgon gyis ma bstan te //
translated: The phrase “who have not been predicted by the protector” refers to🔽the practice of patience.

original: bdag la 'du shes med 'gyur tshe //
analyzed: bdag la 'du shes med 'gyur tshe //
translated: The phrase “when I have no perception of self” refers to

original: sbyin pa'i 'du shes ma lus par //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i 'du shes ma lus par //
translated: the practice of effort.

original: rnam par rtog pa kun spangs nas //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa kun spangs nas //
translated: The phrase “having abandoned all conceptual thoughts” refers to🔽the practice of meditation.

original: de ni byang chub lung bstan to //
analyzed: de ni byang chub lung bstan to //
translated: The phrase “he is predicted to awakening” refers to🔽the practice of wisdom.

original: sbyin pas su ni longs spyod bshad //
analyzed: sbyin pas su ni longs spyod bshad //
translated: The phrase “through generosity, one obtains wealth” refers to🔽the practice of generosity.🔽The phrase “through morality, one obtains heaven” refers to

original: tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris bsgrub //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris bsgrub //
translated: the practice of morality.

original: gang na cung zad mi rnyed pa //
analyzed: gang na cung zad mi rnyed pa //
translated: The phrase “where nothing is obtained” refers to🔽the practice of patience.

original: de ni byang chub bla med do //
analyzed: de ni byang chub bla med do //
translated: The phrase “that is unsurpassed awakening” refers to🔽the practice of effort.

original: dmigs par gnas pa'i sbyin pa rnams //
analyzed: dmigs par gnas pa'i sbyin pa rnams //
translated: The giving that is based on an object

original: mkhas pas ma yin rtog med do //🔽de la theg ba chen bor mi dmigs par //
analyzed: mkhas pas ma yin rtog med do // de la theg ba chen bor mi dmigs par //
translated: is not that of the wise, because it is conceptual.🔽Here, in the Great Vehicle,

original: tshul khrims gcig pa'i dbu ma'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims gcig pa'i dbu ma'o //
translated: the middle way is the sameness of morality that is not based on an object.

original: zhes bstan pa'o //
